property.description: Property sheet to hold xml specification for forms

procedure.description: Hook for CloudManager to remove servers

formalParameter.description: A list of deployments to stop.
Name of the configuration which holds the connection information for Xen. This must reference a valid existing configuration.

procedure.description: Hook for CloudManager to add servers

formalParameter.description: The unique tag for this provision to keep it separate from other provisions stored in the same location.
The name of the configuration which holds all the connection information for Xen.
Name of the network to be used.
Name of an existing Template in Xen.
Name of the virtual machine to be created.
The ElectricCommander workspace the resource should use.
Number of new servers
Pool name for resources

procedure.description: Hook for CloudManager to sync servers

formalParameter.description: A list of deployments to check
Name of the configuration which holds the connection information for Xen. This must reference a valid existing configuration.
Configuration Name
Xen host
The plugin debug level
The configuration name

procedure.description: Create a new VM instance from an existing template.

formalParameter.description: The unique tag for this provision to keep it separate from other provisions stored in the same location.
The name of the configuration which holds all the connection information for Xen.
Create resources?
Name of the network to be used.
Number of virtual machines to provision. If more than one, a suffix (_#) is added to vm names. Default: 1.
The ElectricCommander resource pool names to be associated with the machines in this configuration if resources are created(Space separated list).
The ElectricCommander location to store properties (default is /myJob/Xen/vms).
Name of an existing Template in Xen.
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
Name of the virtual machine to be created.
The ElectricCommander workspace the resource should use.

procedure.description: Deletes EC resources and optionally destroy the virtual machine(s) in Xen.

formalParameter.description: The unique tag for this cleanup.
The name of the configuration which holds all the connection information for Xen.
Delete VM?
Number of virtual machines to cleanup. If more than one, a suffix (_#) is added to vm names. Default: 1.
The ElectricCommander location to store properties (default is /myJob/Xen/vms).
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
Name of the new virtual machine to cleanup.

procedure.description: Clones the specified VM, making a new VM.

formalParameter.description: The unique tag for this clone to keep it separate from other clones stored in the same location.
The name of the configuration which holds all the connection information for Xen.
Number of virtual machines to clone. If more than one, a suffix (_#) is added to vm names. Default: 1.
Name of the Original Virtual machine to clone
The ElectricCommander location to store properties (default is /myJob/Xen/vms).
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
Name of the new virtual machine to be created.
Create resources?
The ElectricCommander resource pool names to be associated with the machines in this configuration if resources are created(Space separated list).
The ElectricCommander workspace the resource should use.

procedure.description: Create resource from a virtual machine.

formalParameter.description: The unique tag for this execution.
The name of the configuration which holds all the connection information for Xen.
Number of virtual machines to create resources. If more than one, a suffix (_#) is added to vm names. Default: 1.
The ElectricCommander resource pool names to be associated with the machines in this configuration if resources are created(Space separated list).
The ElectricCommander location to store properties (default is /myJob/Xen/vms).
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
Name of the virtual machine to create the resource.
The ElectricCommander workspace the resource should use.
The name of the configuration which holds all the connection information for Xen.
Number of virtual machines to destroy. If more than one, a suffix (_#) is added to vm names. Default: 1.
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
Name of the virtual machine to be destroyed.
The name of the configuration which holds all the connection information for Xen.
Number of virtual machines to reboot. If more than one, a suffix (_#) is added to vm names. Default: 1.
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
Name of the virtual machine to reboot.
Hard Reboot VM?
The name of the configuration which holds all the connection information for Xen.
Number of virtual machines to shutdown. If more than one, a suffix (_#) is added to vm names. Default: 1.
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
Name of the virtual machine to shutdown.
Hard Shutdown VM?
The name of the configuration which holds all the connection information for Xen.
Number of virtual machines to pause. If more than one, a suffix (_#) is added to vm names. Default: 1.
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
Name of the virtual machine to be paused.

procedure.description: Awake the specified VM and resume it.

formalParameter.description: The name of the configuration which holds all the connection information for Xen.
Number of virtual machines to resume. If more than one, a suffix (_#) is added to vm names. Default: 1.
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
Name of the virtual machine to be resumed.
Start the VM in paused state
Force Resume operation
The name of the configuration which holds all the connection information for Xen.
Number of virtual machines to start. If more than one, a suffix (_#) is added to vm names. Default: 1.
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
Name of the virtual machine to be started.

procedure.description: Suspend the specified VM to disk.

formalParameter.description: The name of the configuration which holds all the connection information for Xen.
Number of virtual machines to suspend. If more than one, a suffix (_#) is added to vm names. Default: 1.
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
Name of the virtual machine to be suspended.
The name of the configuration which holds all the connection information for Xen.
Number of virtual machines to unpause. If more than one, a suffix (_#) is added to vm names. Default: 1.
Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
Name of the virtual machine to be unpaused.
